data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Ken is planning to study English in college, but his parents would prefer that he study biology. He ____ considering ____ courses ____ both ____. I ____ that ____ should ____ the ____ that ____ most ____ for ____ future ____. But he can't decide if he wants to be a nurse or an author!
data.partBlankContent: Ken is planning to study English in college, but his parents would prefer that he study biology. He i_ considering tak___ courses i_ both fie___. I th___ that h_ should cho___ the cou____ that a__ most impo_____ for h__ future car___. But he can't decide if he wants to be a nurse or an author!
data.answer: 肯打算在大学里学英语，但他的父母更希望他学生物。他正在考虑修这两个领域的课程。我认为他应该选择对他未来的职业生涯最重要的课程。但是他不能决定他是想成为一名护士还是一名作家!
